DOC.brief_summary: Rates cardiovascular disease diabetes 2-fold great HIV infect people general population . Protease inhibitor booster antiretroviral therapy ( PI-ART ) use ~50 % HIV infected people USA establish risk factor diabetes . Tauroursodeoxycholic acid ( TUDCA ) , naturally occur bile salt , improve insulin sensitivity HIV uninfected subject , although mechanisms benefit unclear . This study explore hypothesis TUDCA improve insulin action people HIV receive PI-ART . Further , project clarify molecular mechanism responsible improvement potentially benefit society , irrespective HIV status .
DOC.brief_title: Tauroursodeoxycholic Acid Protease-inhibitor Associated Insulin Resistance
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine , mechanism , tauroursodeoxycholic acid improve insulin sensitivity subject protease-inhibitor associated insulin resistance . The investigator perform body composition analysis use DEXA machine , liver fat measurement use MRI , hyperinsulinemic euglycemic clamp procedure 48 HIV infect , insulin-resistant/prediabetic subject 30 day treatment tauroursodeoxycholic acid match placebo . Biopsies adipose tissue skeletal muscle take fasting condition insulin infusion , treatment measure marker endoplasmic reticulum stress thyroid hormone deiodinase . Outcome measure : The primary outcome measure change glucose clearance insulin infusion , change marker endoplasmic reticulum stress change content D2 muscle .
DOC.criteria: HIV+ receive protease inhibitor contain antiretroviral therapy > 6 month Undetectable viral load insulin resistant 1. impaired fast glucose ( fast blood glucose > 100mg/dl ) 2. impaired glucose tolerance ( blood glucose > 140mg/dl 2 hour oral glucose tolerance test ) . abstained medication affect glucose ( e.g . prednisone , growth hormone ) stable medication > 3 month weight loss > 5 % body weight prior 6 month active gastrointestinal disease ( gallstone , pancreatitis , hepatitis , diarrhea ) use antidiabetic medication cardiovascular disease ( uncontrolled hypertension , heart attack , heart failure , prior endocarditis ) history active substance abuse blood clot disorder take medication affect blood clotting ( e.g . coumadin , warfarin ) pregnant , plan become pregnant lactate unable give inform consent
